channel.title: Not got enough sexy monsters? Check out the Hot Horror Jam
channel.description:
The **Hot Horror Jam** launches today, running for three weeks with an aim to make some standalone ttrpgs of a *hot horror* theme.
I'm currently tossing up between making something about a flesh nest, Purity Ring style, or a sex-positive slasher.
Anyone else making something? Anyone scoring up a bingo card?
https://itch.io/jam/hothorrorjam

Hot Horror Jam

A game jam from 2019-07-26 to 2019-08-31 hosted by Swords and Flowers, Takuma Okada, Jamila R. Nedjadi, Melody Watson & KiennaS. Hot Horror Jam is a tabletop RPG jam of intimate horrors, the supernatural, and how they turn us on. Submissions due...
